description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger, per Āghā Buzurg (XVI, 243). Title on fore edge mistakenly reads: Kitāb Tahdhīb al-wuṣūl ilá ʻilm al-uṣūl. Spine title erroneously reads: Tahdhīb al-uṣūl ʻAllāmah. Physical description: 14 lines per page; written in naskh in black on glazed, laid Arabic paper. Rubricaton and catchwords. Edges flecked with red ink. Marginal damp-staining and a few repairs. Origin: 19th century.
author: Rāstʹgū, Manṣūr ibn ʻAbd Allāh, active 16th century
abstract: Commentary on Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī's Tahdhīb al-wuṣūl ilá ʻilm al-uṣūl; first leaf missing.
extent: 303 leaves : paper ; 194 x 130 (133 x 76) mm bound to 194 x 130 mm
title: [al-Fuṣūl fī sharḥ Tahdhīb al-wuṣūl].
creator: راست گو، منصور بن عبد الله، active 16th century
subject: Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī, al-Ḥasan ibn Yūsuf, 1250-1325—Tahdhīb al-wuṣūl ilá ʻilm al-uṣūl.
binding note: Full brown leather with blind-stamped central mandorla, pendants and fillets; spine repaired.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
